name: Running Out of Space (gary_beebe)
description:
Mirror of my first LD42 48hr Game Jam: Running Out of Space.

Use arrow keys. [Up] to thrust, [Left] / [Right] to turn. [Z] to shoot.

Pick up Health, Shields, and Weapon upgrades to help keep you alive. Oh, and it's a battle royal so try to stay inside the shrinking map.
